name: We can't get through the zombies
name_original: We can't get through the zombies
description:
What do you mean you can't get through the zombies? You've seen all those movies and don't know how to outsmart a couple thousand zombies?

Fight your way through them. Get to your boat. That's all you have to do.

Let's party.

We can’t get through the zombies is a side scrolling blast em all up. Go as far as you can using whatever weapons you can.
Control one of three main characters:
1. Rolo - off duty cop and wheelchair bound flame throwing maniac.
2. Hatty - Zombie slaying, machine gun toting school nurse.
3. Rex - beefy fireman with an axe to grind.

Features ;
- endless zombie waves
- race against time game mechanic
- three main characters with different attributes
- weapon powerups and special weapons
- dynamically evolving scenery
- end goal distance meter.
